main event: A bright spherical light was observed for 3 minutes during a night exercise near Fort Bragg.
interesting points: The light was observed descending in a parabolic trajectory,The object appeared larger than a star and emitted a bright white light,The observation was confirmed by 5 military personnel accompanying General Darby,The sighting was classified as a ground-visual observation,Initial perception suggested the object was extremely large but appeared to accelerate and elongate into a tail before stopping.
witness description: 5 other military personnel accompanying Gen. Darby
